data.text: @KM_CEBS Mr Menon, please DM us your seat preference since, regular seats are complimentary against your booking. However, XL seats will attract 50% of the total amount. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@delhigirlinjpr Hello, we are getting this checked. Allow us some time to get back to you with an update. ~Diyashi

@khushi_goyal89 Ms Goyal, we have processed the refund to the travel agency’s account. We request you to please get in touch with them to get the amount transferred in your original mode of payment which might take up to 5-7 working days. ~Linda
@abhirupganguli Mr Ganguly, our deepest condolences goes out to you & your family. Further, please DM us a contact number to address your concern. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@VenesaHermijil Hello, we never intend to provide bad experiences. Please share your concern over DM so we may assist you. ~Diyashi  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
@AakashRaj728 Hello, we regret to hear this. Could you please share you PNR via DM so we may check and assist. ~Diyashi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@Kajalj1894 Hi, sorry to note your experience. Our team will contact you right way to address your concern. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
@DebolinaAcharj1 Ms Acharjee, please know vaccination documents are not required. Mask is requested to be worn throughout the journey to ensure safety. Thank you. ~Diyashi
@parveshgoyal303 Mr Goyal, we truly regret to see this. Please allow us some time to get this checked and we shall get back to you with an update at the earliest. ~Sheetal
@piushkg Sir, could you please the PNR via DM we have not received it earlier.  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@PandeyVibhow Sir, you may carry the electric kettle, and frozen ghee in your check-in baggage to avoid any spillage. However, pickle is not allowed to carry. Hope this was helpful. ~Sheetal

@akki1875 Hi, we regret to know about your experience. We understand that rude behavior is unacceptable and our team members on the ground are expected to be courteous to all our passengers. Please share your PNR via DM with us. ~Sheetal
  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
@Rajende53515451 Mr Kapoor, we truly regret the discomfort caused to you. Please know that strong feedback will be shared with the concerned team to have the necessary review on this. ~Sheetal
@shruti238909832 Hello, we regret the inconvenience caused. Could you please share the PNR via DM, so we may check and assist as soon as possible. ~Diyashi  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@interrrupted__ Hello, could you please share the PNRs via DM so we may check and get back to you with an update. ~Diyashi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
#GuruNanakJayanti  #goIndiGo https://t.co/mc6DHXj7n2

@DivakarUpare Sir, thank you for acknowledging the efforts that we put in. We are so relieved to know that you received your baggage, we will surely pass on your word of thanks to the concerned team, please DM us your PNR for the same.😊 ~Sheetal
  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@apvk1990 Hello, could you please share your PNR via DM, so we may check and assist. ~Diyashi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc

@d1bb0 Ma'am we regret the inconvenience caused to you. Please know we have noted your feedback and shall highlight the same to our concerned team. Hoping to serve you better in future. Thank you. ~Diyashi
@anishdh22972326 Sir, we believe you have received your baggage. ~Linda
@Iam_Rahul_Raj Hello, yes you can carry sweets in your cabin baggage. Thank you ~Diyashi
@Cheated_by_Sams We deeply regret the inconvenience caused to you, please elaborate a little more so we may assist you. ~Prahlad  https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK

@Sultansm Sir, as checked the booking status is confirmed. In case any unprocessed transaction/unsuccessful transaction/refund (if any) will be automatically processed (auto-refunded) within 7-10 working days if any excess amount has been debited. ~Prahlad
@pradeepan26 Hello, as checked the has already been processed from our end to the primary mode of payment. Please check with you concerned travel agent for the refund. Thank you. ~Diyashi
@Pratiks42658961 Hello, we regret to know this. Could you please share your concern along with the PNR via DM so we may check and assist. ~Diyashi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@quixote333 Sir, please know that our auto assigned seats are limited which get occupied quickly. You can s opt for auto-seat assignment & complete the web check-in. Thank you. ~Diyashi
@pradeepan26 Sir, we are getting this checked right now. We regret the inconvenience caused to you. Allow us some time to get back to you with an update. ~Diyashi
@choudhary_bhoma Hi, can you please confirm the brand, colour & mAh via DM using the link below. ~Linda  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@MPofu_ct Hello, we regret the inconvenience caused. Could you please share your PNR via DM so we may check and assist. Thank you. ~Diyashi  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@Subodhrw Hello, you may show the hospital discharge summary as the age proof. To know more please visit https://t.co/pfdFKdK2di . Thank you. ~Diyashi

urls.title: FAQs About Infants Travelling in a Flight - IndiGo
urls.description: Read all the frequently asked questions about fee for infants on-board, baggage allowance & the age group of an infant. Explore complete FAQs at goIndiGo.in.

data.text: @interrrupted__ Hi, please be informed changes cannot be made once the booking has been confirmed. ~Linda
@kirithikas Hi, thank you for the shout out. :) Please DM us your PNR so we can pass on your kudos to the team. ~Linda

@Richakararia Hello, we are disappointed to see this. Could you please share your PNR via DM so we check and assist. Please let us know if you reported the same at the airport. ~Diyashi  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK

@Sultansm @happyeasygo Hi, we're unable to find any booking for the mentioned date against the given email ID. We'd request you to kindly contact the concerned travel agency for further assistance. ~Linda
@zingostan Hello, please know the CUTE charge is the Common User Terminal Equipment. It is also called a passenger handling fee, which is charged for using the airport equipment. ~Diyashi

@d1bb0 Ms Chatterjee, we do not have such facilities on board yet. We hope to upgrade in the coming days. Further, you might want to visit https://t.co/d1qbIuFlXp to explore our wide array of snacks available for pre-booking. ~Linda

urls.title: 6E Tiffin: Snacks Menu, Pre-book Hygienic Snacks - IndiGo
urls.description: Pre-book your 6E Tiffin from our menu with hygienic & delicious snacks before your IndiGo flight. Only pre-booked snacks available! Book add-ons at goIndiGo.in

data.text: @flyingdinesh Hi, sorry to note your experience. Your feedback is important to us & will be shared with the concerned team right away for necessary review which will help us serve you better in the future. ~Linda

@neerajberi01 Mr Beri, may we request you to please visit https://t.co/csj0lHZvNU & refer to 'Flying into India: State-wise guidelines' for comprehensive information related to international travel guidelines. ~Linda

urls.title: Travel Guidelines: International Arrivals & Departures - IndiGo
urls.description: Mandatory travel guidelines for passengers flying from India to international destinations and back to India. Detailed advisory & requirements at goIndiGo.in

data.text: @JainJain81 Sir, we regret the trouble. We request you to share your PNR and the complaint acknowledgment copy (PIR) via DM issued by our customer service team at the arrival airport for us to take a closer look and assist you.~ Nandita   https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@akshayj1135 Sir, we regret the delay. We are sharing this with our concerned team to expedite the process. Meanwhile, you may reach out to our airport staff for real-time assistance.~ Nandita

@wanderingtechie Hi, we regret the trouble. This is certainly not the experience we wish our customers to have. We request you to share your PNR via DM so, we may check and assist you further.~ Nandita  https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@sharma307_twit Sir, we request you to share your PNR via DM so, we may check and assist you further.~ Nandita   https://t.co/xcJPAix5sK
@JordenJigmie Hi, we regret the inconvenience. We request you to DM us your PNR so, we may check and assist you further.~ Nandita   https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@Shailes60207357 Further, you may reach out to our airport staff for real-time assistance.~ Nandita (2/2)

@Shailes60207357 Sir, we regret the trouble. We never want family traveling together to sit apart.  Advance seat selection at a nominal fee helps our customers to reserve the seat of their choice on the flight to avoid any last-minute hassle.(1/2)
@jhunjhun1981 Hi, please share your concern in detail via DM so, we may look into it and assist you further.~ Nandita   https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@jdsabal Ma'am, we regret the inconvenience caused. We request you to share your PNR via DM so, we may check and assist you further.~ Nandita   https://t.co/xcJPAig2qK
@balramgkp Hi, complete name changes are not permitted. Only minor spelling errors can be rectified. Further, please share the correct PNR via Dm so we may check and advise. ~Ojasvi
@frowneycrowley Hi, please DM the PNR so we may get it checked. ~Shreya  https://t.co/xcJPAifuBc
@raghurao1987 Sir, we're constantly optimizing our schedule as our operations depend on various factors. We will share your feedback with the Route Planning Team . Stay tuned! ~Ojasvi
